meanings.definition: A type of pasta thinner than spaghetti.
meanings.sent1: I cooked some spaghettini for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She twirled the spaghettini around her fork.
meanings.sent3: The spaghettini tried to escape the pot, but I caught it!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was like a tangled nest of spaghettini.
meanings.sent5: The spaghettini danced in the boiling water.

meanings.sent1: The spaghettini was delicate and delicious.
meanings.sent2: He slurped up the spaghettini eagerly.
meanings.sent3: The spaghettini strands played jump rope in the pot.
meanings.sent4: The spaghettini was a tiny maze on the plate.
meanings.sent5: Each spaghettini strand was like a tiny thread of flavor.
